GULF OF GUINEA.
BENIN.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 06-17N 002-21E AT
   172300Z FEB. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
   CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE
   EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO MDAT-GOG,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 250028Z FEB 18.
